availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Served in the War of 1812. Married Nancy Smith on January 25, 1816. Was a Farmer in Mercer County Kentucky in 1850 and 1860. Died in Harrodsburg, Mercer County Kentucky.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, "Abraham Smith (April 3, 1791 - January 1, 1865)" Memorial #142448047, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=142448047&ref=acom (accessed June 26,2017); Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, District No. 1, p. 247; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, Harrodsburg, p. 48.
